The Protocol for Decentralized Token Exchange

The new crypto trading standard has arrived.

watch the video

What Loopring Means to Crypto

With Loopring, traders will have complete and total control of their crypto-assets. This means that there will be no more need to go through the pesky and risky process of depositing money to centralized exchanges. Who needs that aggravation?!

  • Low trading fees

  • Better liquidity

  • Ultimate security ensures less risk

  • Easy and transparent trading

  • Maximum flexibility

All trading will be able to be done right from the trader's wallet!

learn more

What Loopring Means to Crypto

With Loopring, traders will have complete and total control of their crypto-assets. This means that there will be no more need to go through the pesky and risky process of depositing money to centralized exchanges. Who needs that aggravation?!

learn more

  • Loopring is risk free and low cost as the relays don't hold users'assets. You can match orders with minimum assets enabling you to start small and work your way up!

  • Create a relay with abundant crypto-tokens and provide more liquidity by adding your own orders, to earn more money as a market-maker!

  • Commitment issues? Don't worry! As a participant of the Loopring ecosystem, you can stop at any time, with no affect to the assets of you or your users.

Loopring Brings New Source of Income

  • Loopring is risk free and low cost as the relays don't hold users'assets. You can match orders with minimum assets enabling you to start small and work your way up!

  • Create a relay with abundant crypto-tokens and provide more liquidity by adding your own orders, to earn more money as a market-maker!

  • Commitment issues? Don't worry! As a participant of the Loopring ecosystem, you can stop at any time, with no affect to the assets of you or your users.

Why Protocols Matter?

  • 01
    The Loopring protocol is blockchain agnostic, and can be deployed on any blockchain with smart contract capability.

    The Loopring protocol is blockchain agnostic, and can be deployed on any blockchain with smart contract capability.
